sense.def: Pathological Condition of tou feng 頭風 , head wind, characterized by pain in the front and top of the head. Gu jin yi jian Book on clinical medicine. Ming era, 古今醫鑒 1576. 16: 偏頭風，川芎湯下。正頭風，羌活湯。雷頭風，薄荷湯 下 , “For hemilateral head wind, ingest it with the decoction with chuan xiong . For proper head wind , [ingest it with] the decoction with qiang huo . For thundering head wind [ingest it with] the decoction with bo he ”.
